publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3609 Alex Johnstone: Impact of Private Water Supplies (Scotland) Regulations—That the Parliament notes with concern the impact of the Private Water Supplies (Scotland) Regulations 2005 on hundreds of small businesses throughout Scotland, which could be facing bills of up to £10,000 to upgrade their water supply as a consequence, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider increasing the grant support on offer to those businesses affected, which would help to protect vulnerable jobs and services in rural businesses. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3609 Impact of Private Water Supplies (Scotland) Regulations (lodged on 22 November 2005) Murdo Fraser*

S2M-3609 Alex Johnstone: Impact of Private Water Supplies (Scotland) Regulations—That the Parliament notes with concern the impact of the Private Water Supplies (Scotland) Regulations 2005 on hundreds of small businesses throughout Scotland, which could be facing bills of up to £10,000 to upgrade their water supply as a consequence, and urges the Scottish Executive to consider increasing the grant support on offer to those businesses affected, which would help to protect vulnerable jobs and services in rural businesses. Supported by: Murdo Fraser
